title: ResearchStudy Classifier Code System

extension.valueMarkdown: ResearchStudy Classifier Code System [Database Entry: FHIR CodeSystem Resource]. Contributors: Brian S. Alper, MD, MSPH [Authors/Creators]. In: Fast Evidence Interoperability Resources (FEvIR) Platform, FOI 419455. Revised 2026-01-05. Available at: https://fevir.net/resources/CodeSystem/419455. Computable resource at: https://fevir.net/resources/CodeSystem/419455#json.

name: ResearchStudyClassifierCodeSystem
description: This CodeSystem is used for common values for the ResearchStudy.classifier element and will likely move to terminology.hl7.org when it is mature.

concept.definition: A medication regulated by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.
A medical device regulated by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.
Human subjects research that is excempt from oversight and monitoring by an institutional review board (IRB).
Research regulated by a specific German legal requirement (Medizinproduktegesetz MPG Paragraph 23b).
Includes female subjects
Does not include female subjects
Includes male subjects
Does not include male subjects
Includes vulnerable populations
Does not include vulnerable populations
Includes healthy volunteers
Does not include healthy volunteers
Includes subjects who are not yet born
Includes subjects between birth and 17 years of age (not yet 18 years old)
Includes subjects between 18 and 64 years of age (not yet 65 years old)
Includes subjects aged 65 years and older
Includes subjects who are preterm newborns (up to gestational age < 37 weeks)
Includes subjects between 0 and 27 days of age
Includes subjects between 28 days and 23 months of age
Includes subjects between 2 and 5 years of age (not yet 6 years old)
Includes subjects between  6 and 11 years of age (not yet 12 years old)
Includes subjects between 12 and 17 years of age (not yet 18 years old)
Includes subjects between 65 and 84 years of age (not yet 85 years old)
Includes subjects aged 85 years and older
